price: ߊ߬ ߝߣߊ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߘߐ߬ߞߐ ߟߊߝߌ߬ߟߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ߞߌ߲ߣߊ߲߬ߞߊ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߜߍ ߘߐ߫ ߌߞߘߐ߫
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعۡبَانٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya thuʿ'bānun mubīnun
